alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:17PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Breathitt County through 300 PM EDT... At 216 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Curt, or near Jackson, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Curt, Howard Creek, Saldee and Copland around 220 PM EDT. Haddix around 225 PM EDT. Quicksand, Dumont, Inverness, Lost Creek, Flintville and Clayhole around 230 PM EDT. Jackson, Portsmouth, Smith Branch and Noctor around 235 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Haginsville, Wilstacy, Press, Stevenson, Sikes and Rousseau. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
